item.description:
Lets kick the summer off right with a long weekend of hikes, BBQ and bonfires! Saturday and Sunday will each have 2 hiking options - Moderate and advanced with an additional moderate-plus hike on Monday. Moderate hikes will be in the 4 to 5 mile range and the advanced will be around 9 miles.

This will be a great intro-weekend to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club. If you have never been to our house then this is an ideal weekend to make your first visit. The Wedeln Ski House is located on the Bartlet / N. Conway town line. The house is tucked away half way up Hurricane Mountain and has hiking and biking trails right out the back side of the house. Accommodations are only $25 per night, bring your own bedding.

We are still working on the hike and entertainment schedule. Possible hikes include:

The Moat Mountains

Mt. Pierce

Mt. Carrigain

Mt. Stairs

Mt. Kearsarge North

More details to come. We are also planning a cookout for Saturday night and will be requesting an additional $20 to help buy food for the event.

Please do not use GPS to find house, you will get lost. Directions will be sent to all attendees.
item.name: Memorial Day Hiking Weekend
